Keywords: Starjammers , X-Factor , X-Men
Real Name: Scott Summers
Team Up
01
TEAM UP: COLOSSUS, EMMA FROST, MAGIK, NAMOR: If 1+ listed friendly characters are on the map, Cyclops and listed friendly characters can use Colossal Stamina. If Cyclops and all listed friendly characters are on the map, they can use Invulnerability, Defend and the Mystics team ability. (After revealing forces, you may replace character cards with their alternates. You can't choose a Team Up if your starting characters share a name).
02
TEAM UP: ANGEL, ARCHANGEL, BEAST, ICEMAN, JEAN GREY, MARVEL GIRL: If 2+ listed friendly characters are on the map, Cyclops and listed friendly characters can use Police team ability. (After revealing forces, you may replace character cards with their alternates. You can't choose a Team Up if your starting characters share a name).
03
TEAM UP: BEAST, GAMBIT, JUBILEE, PSYLOCKE, ROGUE, WOLVERINE: If 1+ listed friendly characters are on the map, Cyclops increases his roll for Leadership by 1. If 3+ friendly characters are on the map, when Cyclops uses it, he considers characters within line of fire adjacent. (After revealing forces, you may replace character cards with their alternates. You can't choose a Team Up if your starting characters share a name.)
04
TEAM UP: MAGIK: If Cyclops is adjacent to the friendly listed character, modify range -2 and he can use [Improved Targeting: Elevated; Hindering; Once per range attack, this character can draw a line of fire through one piece of Blocking terrain. Immediately after the attack resolves, destroy that piece of Blocking terrain; Characters]. (After revealing forces, you may replace character cards with their alternates. You can't choose a Team Up if your starting characters share a name.)
05
TEAM UP: MARVEL GIRL, WOLVERINE: If Cyclops and all listed friendly characters are on the map, when they attack and their (final) attack roll includes a [3], they increase their attack roll by +3. (After revealing forces, you may replace character cards with their alternates. You can't choose a Team Up if your starting characters share a name.)
06
TEAM UP: X-MEN THEMED TEAM: When establishing themed teams, friendly characters with the X-Men keyword gain the Utopia keyword. (After revealing forces, you may replace character cards with their alternates. You can't choose a Team Up if your starting characters share a name.)
Special Powers
TARGETING: This character can make range attacks while adjacent to opposing characters. (May target adjacent or non-adjacent opposing characters.)
SIBLING RIVALRY: Leadership. // Once per turn, when a friendly character named Havok hits, modify Cyclops's combat values +1 this turn.
YOU WILL FORGET WHO YOU ARE FOR A MINUTE: Force Blast, Sidestep. // When Cyclops hits with a range attack, after resolutions all hit targets can use Battle Fury until your next turn.
Trade Cyclops Want Cyclops

guyncognito
I love how wizkids redesigns the cards to make it so that the text isn't over the top and then we get a set full of characters with novel-length cards.
January 10, 2021
Dortmuner
[QUOTE=Ultimate2099;12100825]So when it says “can use battle fury” that’s not optional for the target right? This is meant to hurt ranged characters I assume.[/QUOTE] That's correct. They have to use it. There are several ways giving it to someone can hurt them (can't range, can't be carried), but also several ways it can help them (Protected Incap and MC, opposing characters can't use Shape Change when attacked by this character). It depends on the situation whether it's a blessing or a curse or a little of both.
January 10, 2021
Ultimate2099
So when it says “can use battle fury” that’s not optional for the target right? This is meant to hurt ranged characters I assume.
January 9, 2021
Cyke82
Nothing fancy here, but Cyclops does have some nice tricks up his sleeve. Need to bust a formation? He’s got EE. Need to knock someone back? He’s got Force Blast. Need to neutralize an opposing sniper? Hit them and give them Battle Fury. Three clicks of RCE to help you either hit a high defense or add some damage to the result. I might enjoy those last three clicks more than the first, so he’s pushable. Lots of great team-up cards, too. We’ve seen more than a few Cyclops figures in this point range, but this one holds its own.
